description: The elements that make up the table. Includes the TableHeader, TableBody, TableColumn, and TableRow.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: Color of the selected rows, and checkboxes.
Defines the layout of the table.
The border-radius of the table.
The shadow size of the table.
Whether to hide the table header.
Whether to apply striped rows in the table.
Whether to apply compact style to the table.
Whether to make the table header sticky.
Whether to make the table full width.
Whether the table base container should not be rendered.
A custom wrapper component for the table.
Provides content to include a component in the top of the table.
Provides content to include a component in the bottom of the table.
Where to place the topContent component.
Where to place the bottomContent component.
Whether the row selection checkboxes should be displayed.
The current sorted column and direction.
The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
A set of keys for rows that are disabled.
Whether the collection allows empty selection.
The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
How multiple selection should behave in the collection.
Whether disabledKeys applies to all interactions, or only selection.
Whether onSelectionChange should fire even if the new set of keys is the same as the last.
Whether to disable the table and checkbox animations.
Props to be passed to the checkboxes.
Allows to set custom class names for the dropdown item slots.
Whether to disable keyboard navigations or not.
